result.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ فَسۡـَٔلۡ بِهِۦ خَبِيرٗا
result.translation: 59.Yalla kinni Qaranwaa kee baaxóoy, ken nammayih fanal tanim lica ayróh addat gintcm, tohuk lakal Yalli qarshi amol fayya iyyeeh isi nabna celta massoynah massoowe, usuk Racmaan kinni, tokkel Nabiyow Yalla esser usuk kulliimik adda yaaxigi kinnik.
